title: VEGA_SPORT
author: VEGA_SPORT
content: BTC just dropped below 17k and ETH fell below 1300. Are we still in a bear market or is it over?  What do you do in this World Cup 2022 season? I love the team with Samba dance. I'll bet it all on it when the football game is on this Friday.In addition, I also found a sports-loving community to discuss and exchange about favorite football teams.Their Telegram link if anyone is interested  : https://t.me/vegasportingThey also have a great decentralized betting platform where I can comfortably bet on my team and make a lot of profit  Website: https://vegasport.io/
